conclusion: Analyze forces to find coefficient of kinetic friction between block and plate
Block of mass m placed on plate of mass M=2m with zero initial velocity
Both block and plate experience friction
Plate experiences frictional force equal in magnitude but opposite in direction to f1
Relative acceleration between block and plate is a_relative=3μ1g/2
Block does not leave plate, velocity-time relationship given in Figure B
Block reaches same velocity as plate when they stop slipping relative to each other
Assume block reaches same velocity as plate in time t, v_relative=0 at time t
Frictional force acts over time t to stop relative motion
Assume typical scenario where block reaches plate's velocity in time t
